summary: Completed comprehensive testing of edit video form at /coach/dashboard/videos/video-1. Form loads correctly with pre-filled data, all UI elements are functional, and backend API integration works properly. Minor issue with success toast notification not appearing after save.

ui_bugs.issue: Success toast 'Class updated successfully!' not appearing after save operation
Target area and Type chips not showing pre-selected state on initial load

passed_tests: Edit video page loads at /coach/dashboard/videos/video-1
Form pre-fills with existing video data (Title: 'Full Body HIIT Workout', Description: detailed text)
Max length dropdown shows current duration value (30 minutes)
Fitness goal chips display with 'Lose weight' selected
Visibility radio buttons show 'Publish' selected
Featured checkbox shows unchecked state
Back to library link is visible and clickable
Delete button is visible and clickable
SAVE CHANGES button is visible and enabled
Title field editing works correctly
Max length dropdown selection works (changed to 45 minutes)
Target area chip selection works (clicked Upper body)
Fitness goal chip selection works (clicked Build muscle)
Type chip selection works (clicked Strength)
Visibility radio button selection works (clicked Publish)
Featured checkbox toggle works
Video file dropzone is visible with 'click to upload' text
Cover image dropzone is visible with 'click to upload' text
Backend API PATCH /videos endpoint works correctly
Backend API GET /videos/video-1 endpoint returns proper data
Delete modal appears with proper content when Delete button clicked
Delete modal has Cancel and Delete Class buttons
Cancel button closes delete modal properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix success toast notification not appearing after save operation. The backend API is working correctly (returns SUCCESS status), but the frontend toast system may not be properly configured or the toast component is not rendering. Also investigate why Target area and Type chips don't show pre-selected state on initial load despite the data being available.
